text:
GENERAL ELECTRIC
COMPANY
EDUCATIONAL RELATIONS
AND
CORPORATE SUPPORT SERVICE
ONE RIVER ROAD, SCHENECTADY 5, NEW YORK
TELEPHONE FRANKLIN 4-2211
February 3, 1958
Mrs. Judith B. Gans, Secretary
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
111 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mrs. Gans:
Thank you for your courtesy in notifying me that the
N.A.E.B. Fact Sheets are still available at the usual $2.50
price. I am sorry to say that I have no present use for
these sheets, and I do not plan to subscribe to them this
year.
I appreciate your calling this to my attention.
Sincerely yours
Neil B. Reynolds^
NBR/k
